description.value: The riding drake breathes a @Template[type:cone|distance:30]{30-foot cone} of fire, dealing [[/r ((ceil(@actor.level/2))d6)[fire]]]{1d6 fire damage for every 2 levels the drake has} to all creatures in the area (basic Reflex save). This uses a trained DC using the drake's Constitution modifier or an expert DC if the drake is specialized.
